attributes.action: Make the song Flower of Scotland our National Anthem for Scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scotland has its own independance now and we the people of scotland want our own recognised National Anthem !
We dont want God save the Queen.!
We want the song "FLOWER OF SCOTLAND" written by the "Corries". This song means so much to scottish people and feel it in our hearts & when we sing it, we feel proud to be scottish.!!
We deserve it and we mean no disrespect to the queen and her sovereignty in asking to give us this right we request!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
